body_html:
@pooryapzm , I am still keeping track of the things and will make any required changes if necessary.

@kshitij12345 Thanks.
I really need this feature. Do you have any time estimation for that?

The double backward works with all the commits in this Pull Request. It would actually be great if you would use it and give any feedback.

My branch has the pytorch:master till commit of 20 Sep 2018.
body:
> > @pooryapzm , I am still keeping track of the things and will make any required changes if necessary.
> 
> @kshitij12345 Thanks.
> I really need this feature. Do you have any time estimation for that?

The double backward works with all the commits in this Pull Request. It would actually be great if you would use it and give any feedback. 

My branch has the pytorch:master till [commit](https://github.com/kshitij12345/pytorch/commit/ae1a972d78950abc4dab372f496914b5e78b9637) of 20 Sep 2018.
